name: Stop Simulator
description:
STOP SIMULATOR is a maybe confusing, convoluted and probably tedious 1-button game.

Controls: If on pc, use the left mouse button.

               If on a laptop, use the touchpad.

             If on mobile, tap on the screen.

Objective: Guide the player to the flag. The flag will throw curveballs right off from the first level.

Everything in this game will have curveballs.

And the switch turns off a wall. Don't think about it too much.
